description:
Set on the top level of a boutique complex of only eight, this three-bedroom apartment invites you to enjoy living in one of New Farm's most prestigious and sought-after streets. Looking straight out over leafy Merthyr Park to the Brisbane River and city skyline beyond, this exceptional property boasts a generous frontage to the river, direct access through the complex to the riverfront and spacious covered balconies for year-round entertaining.

Beautifully designed, the residence complements its picturesque surrounds with polished timber floors, full-height glass and a fresh white colour palette.

Perfect for relaxing and spending time with guests, a spacious open-plan living and dining area continues from the apartment's welcoming entry. Avid cooks and gourmands alike will also appreciate the fantastic adjoining kitchen, which displays stainless-steel appliances and ample cupboard storage.

Rarely found in apartments, 85sqm of covered and generous wrap-around balcony commands phenomenal 270-degree river and city views. This promises to be the setting of many unforgettable gatherings. Here, sit down to a leisurely al fresco meal, toast the sunset or unwind in your private spa-with-a-view.

Also connected to the river-fronting balcony, an ensuited master bedroom encompasses a large walk-in robe. The two additional bedrooms are fitted with built-in robes and are serviced by a tidy main bathroom, each with access to respective balconies.

Benefitting from a European-style laundry and rare secure side-by-side parking for two cars, the property also includes air-conditioning, ceiling fans, screens fitted to doors and outside aluminium shutters. Residents can also enjoy the use of the complex's impressive swimming pool, as well as direct access to Merthyr Park's riverwalks.

Only three kilometres from Brisbane's CBD, this sensational apartment is close to a slew of restaurants and cafes. The Sydney Street Ferry Terminal and New Farm Park are just streets away, while the fashionable James Street and Howard Smith Wharves precincts are nearby. Anglican Church Grammar School ('Churchie'), Brisbane Girls Grammar School and Gregory Terrace College are also easily accessible from this address.

This is your entry into penthouse living in New Farm. Do not delay, contact Simon or Courtney today for your inspection.
Outgoings Include:
Administration Fund: $1,728.75 per quarter approx.
Sinking Fund: $630.75 per quarter approx.
Total Contributions: $2,359.50 per quarter approx. (excl. insurance)
Council Rates: $683.25 per quarter approx.
